txt.en: 'Newcomers need to speak with Ithurga. If you're not willing to make that effort, then you'd best consider shoving off to another port on the Shield Isles, stranger. You'll find Ithurga outside his home at the top of the hill.'
Halrax, a lively town of pirates and freebooters, is nestled on the isle of Zamarzîr in the Shield Isles.

'It's good that you came to see me, stranger. As you learned, my name is Ithurga. I oversee Halrax. I maintain its operations and its people's safety. I'm sure you understand that strange faces make people wary.\n\n'They become warier when they see idle hands belonging to those faces. If you want to be welcome here, do your part and show the locals that you mean well. Understand?'
Talk to Ithurga, the Grey Rogue
Ithurga is outside his home atop the hill in Halrax.\n\nAfter arriving in Halrax on the isle of Zamarzîr, a freebooter instructed you to speak with Ithurga, the Grey Rogue.
